casebody.data:
Abraham Salomon, Respondent v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided March 2, 1891. Appeal from a judgment entered on the findings and decision of a judge on a trial at special term before the court without a jury. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Leo C. Dessar, for respondent.

Before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment appealed from affirmed, with costs.
